title: Does this justify a perma ban?
body:

skosao: omg

skosao: bot you are worthless

skosao: srs go practice mechanics
skosao: vs bots

skosao: how are u so bad
skosao: you must be a real winner in real life
skosao: live off social security?
skosao: or maybe in your parents house still?
skosao: lmao

skosao: i know i saw
skosao: shes noob af

skosao: you fed tf out of lucian
skosao: uninstall league pls
skosao: no

Game 3

skosao: no jungle gg

skosao: lol ok
skosao: what about 2-9 draven feed?
skosao: 2-10 draven feed
skosao: THEN DONT CALL ADC

skosao: lmao ok
skosao: then dont volunteer if you cant adc worth nothing
skosao: how am i trolling
skosao: look at draven score
skosao: nasus auto locked
skosao: and then he complains about people troll
skosao: ty
skosao: sej called top and nasus auto locked
skosao: leaving us with no jungle
skosao: as you can see nasus is extremely toxic, pls report


simple.. yes or no?

is there anywhere i can have this decision reviewed? I don't think this is justified for perma ban.. chat restriction yes, 14 day suspension, yes, perma ban? no
